/*programmed by dipjal */

#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#define pb push_back
#define sz(c) c.size()
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;

#define mod 1000000007

static inline ll scan2()
{
    ll x=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return(x);
}

static inline int scan1()
{
    int x=0;

    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }

    return(x);
}


static inline void WriteInt(long long int x)
{
    char s[15];
    int l=0;
    do
    {
        s[l++]=(x%10+'0');
        x/=10;
    }while(x);
    l--;
    while(l>=0)
    {
        putchar_unlocked(s[l]);
        l--;
    }
    putchar_unlocked('\n');
}



long long int dp[10001];
void preCalc()
{
    dp[0]=0;
    dp[1]=9;
    dp[2]=90;
    dp[3]=900;
    for(int i=4;i<10001;i++)
        dp[i]=(9*(dp[i-1]+dp[i-2]+dp[i-3]))%mod;
        return;}





int main()
{
    //ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    //cin.tie(0);
    int T;
    int K;
    int N;
    preCalc();
    T=scan1();
    while(T--)
    {
        N=scan1();
        WriteInt(dp[N]);

    }
    return 0;
}
